org.acra.annotation

Annotation Type AcraLimiter


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Inherited
public @interface AcraLimiter
    Limiter configuration
    Since:
    26.10.2017

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean deleteReportsOnAppUpdate
      This property can be used to determine whether old (out of date) reports should be sent or not.
      int exceptionClassLimit
      limit for reports with the same exception class
      int failedReportLimit
      limit for unsent reports
      int overallLimit
      general limit of reports
      long period
      Reports which have been collected before this will not be considered for any limits except failedReportLimit()
      TimeUnit periodUnit
      Unit of period()
      boolean resetLimitsOnAppUpdate
      Resetting limits after an app update allows you to see if a bug still exists.
      int resIgnoredCrashToast
      toast shown when a report was not collected or sent because a limit was exceeded
      int stacktraceLimit
      limit for reports with the same stacktrace

    • Element Detail

      • periodUnit

        @NonNull
public abstract TimeUnit periodUnit
        Unit of period()
        Returns:
        a time unit
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit.DAYS

      • period

        public abstract long period
        Reports which have been collected before this will not be considered for any limits except failedReportLimit()
        Returns:
        number of periodUnit()s in which to limit reports
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        7L

      • overallLimit

        public abstract int overallLimit
        general limit of reports
        Returns:
        maximum number of reports per period
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        25

      • stacktraceLimit

        public abstract int stacktraceLimit
        limit for reports with the same stacktrace
        Returns:
        maximum number of reports with the same stacktrace per period
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        3

      • exceptionClassLimit

        public abstract int exceptionClassLimit
        limit for reports with the same exception class
        Returns:
        maximum number of reports with the same exception class per period
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        10

      • failedReportLimit

        public abstract int failedReportLimit
        limit for unsent reports
        Returns:
        maximum number of unsent reports to keep
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        5

      • resIgnoredCrashToast

        @StringRes
public abstract int resIgnoredCrashToast
        toast shown when a report was not collected or sent because a limit was exceeded
        Returns:
        Resource id for the toast shown when a crash was ignored
        Since:
        5.0.0
        Default:
        0

      • deleteReportsOnAppUpdate

        public abstract boolean deleteReportsOnAppUpdate
        This property can be used to determine whether old (out of date) reports should be sent or not.
        Returns:
        if ACRA should delete any unsent reports on startup if the application has been updated.
        Since:
        5.3.0
        Default:
        true

      • resetLimitsOnAppUpdate

        public abstract boolean resetLimitsOnAppUpdate
        Resetting limits after an app update allows you to see if a bug still exists.
        Returns:
        if ACRA should reset all limits on startup if the application has been updated.
        Since:
        5.3.0
        Default:
        true
